tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE client_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(255),
    interaction_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE client_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE inquiries (
    inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    inquiry_type VARCHAR(50),
    inquiry_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    inquiry_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE client_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE client_inquiries (
    inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    inquiry_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    inquiry_type VARCHAR(50),
    inquiry_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE personalized_experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    experience_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    experience_type VARCHAR(50),
    experience_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(255),
    interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE inquiries (
    inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    inquiry_date TIMESTAMP,
    inquiry_type VARCHAR(255),
    inquiry_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(255),
    client_email VARCHAR(255),
    client_phone VARCHAR(20),
    registration_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE client_inquiries (
    inquiry_id INTEGER,
    client_id INTEGER,
    inquiry_type VARCHAR(50),
    inquiry_date TIMESTAMP,
    inquiry_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    recommendation_id INTEGER,
    user_id INTEGER,
    recommendation_type VARCHAR(50),
    recommendation_date TIMESTAMP,
    recommendation_details TEXT
);
